value:
Osian may have the body of an adult,
but he's still got the MIND of a child...
If I weren't looking after him...

My dad used to be a bandit in the
Mount Violdrake territory, but he's
put all that behind him now.

Hey, you've got a lot on your plate,
right? Well, I can do some chores
if it'd let you go get some rest...

There are so many beautiful women
around here... How much trouble is
it to look like that, I wonder...

Hey! I just noticed there's a hole
in your robe! Hand it over. I'll fix
it for you real quick.

...It's $Nu, right?
Great! I'm here to deliver a greeting
from $Nf... Done!

Show me my next target! Nothing
can escape me and my bow!
Passable. I'll keep working at it.

I guess my heart just wasn't in it...
Sorry! I'll try harder.

Oh—thanks! I'll get you something in
return. You can count on that!

I'm Tanya. If you think you can
underestimate me just because I'm
a girl, I'll teach ya a thing or two!

H-hey... I've been wondering...do
boys like girls who are all "refined"
and "ladylike"?$k$pThere are all these princesses and
songstresses around... And it's just—
there are SO MANY of them!$k$pDon't give me that look! I know
I shouldn't worry about it... I just
worry about fitting in, I guess...$k$pAnd NO, I'm not trying to attract
anyone or draw a bunch of attention,
if that's what you're thinking!$k$pBut...thanks for listening. Let me
buy you some food next time,
all right?$k$pI've gotta build a good reputation
somehow... It can't ALWAYS be a
beauty contest!
おらっ
逃がすか！
うっ…
もう…！
Here we go...
Are you blind?!
I can do this myself!
Don't just stand there!
Help me... Osian...
*laugh*
I'm Tanya. Dagdar's my dad. Have you...met him?
Hey—watch it! Pick on me, and I'll make you regret it!
Osian always treats me like a kid... Yeah, well...HE'S the kid!
When Eyvel's around, my dad can be...a little pathetic.
I really admire Leif! There's something about him that makes me want to help him as much as I can.
Osian is such an oaf! Would it kill him to be nice every once in a while?
You... You're not bad. In fact, I like you.
Right!
Oh really?
Like you could stop me!
